meanings.definition: Lornest: superlative form of lorn, meaning abandoned or lonely.
meanings.sent1: The lornest puppy in the shelter looked up with sad eyes.
meanings.sent2: She felt lornest when her friends forgot her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The lornest teddy bear sat on the shelf, waiting for a hug.
meanings.sent4: The old, lornest house on the hill seemed to whisper tales of the past.
meanings.sent5: The lornest tree in the forest stood bare and forgotten by all.
